description:
Place notes, reminders, pictures, maps or weather info directly on your desktop/home screen wallpaper to stay organized.

Never miss an appointment, meeting, birthday party, due dates... Have all your ideas exactly where you can always see them.

Desktop Widgets are static & are not updated automatically. This app is not compatible with wallpaper switchers or other similar programs and requires working internet connection. All data (excluding maps and weather) are rendered locally on your device.

This application works with HP webOS 1.4.5 or higher, but webOS 2.0+ is recommended. Pre, Pre+, Pre2 only (does NOT work with HP Touchpad).
